definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

pinyin: A1 si1 pei4 er3 ge2 er3

sentences.english: Fulgrim of the Emperor's Children was the closest to horus.
sentences.chinese: 帝皇之子的福尔格里姆是最亲近何鲁斯的人。

sentences.english: Goldberg said researchers have been working with robots for 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔德贝尔格说研究人员50年来一直研究机器人。

sentences.english: OK, I was wrong about my earlier less-than-flattering description of the Hostel Belgrade.
sentences.chinese: 好了，我先前对贝尔格莱德旅馆的不恭之词错了。

sentences.english: The Beagle's first stop was one of the Cape Verde Islands near the coast of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔格号第一站在非洲海岸附近的佛得角停靠。

sentences.english: Unlike Milgram's experiment, this shock was real.
sentences.chinese: 与米尔格伦实验不同的是，这种电击是真实的。

sentences.english: The Beagle continued to the coast of South America.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔格号继续驶向南美海岸。

sentences.english: Ignore this effect if Erg Raiders has summoning sickness.
sentences.chinese: 如果尔格骑队正处于召唤失调，则忽略此效果。

sentences.english: I have some raw data that I want to import to ELGG social networking website.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些，我要导入到埃尔格社交网站的原始数据。

sentences.english: Its seat is located in the town of Vårgårda.
sentences.chinese: 它的中心位于沃尔格达镇。

sentences.english: Recordings were an important part of the work of the Alban Berg Quartet.
sentences.chinese: 录音都表明了贝尔格四重奏工作的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Rosemary arranges for Jack to live temporarily with his friend Chuck Bolger.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯玛丽安排生活暂时杰克与他的朋友查博尔格。

sentences.english: Pine Island Bay is tucked into a corner of the West Antarctic’s Walgreen Coast.
sentences.chinese: 松岛湾位于是西南极洲的沃尔格林海岸。

sentences.english: Belgrade intends to harmonise the law with those in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔格莱德打算同欧洲的法律一致。

sentences.english: At just 24 years old, Garg has two ventures to her name.
sentences.chinese: 年仅24岁的加尔格名下已经有了两家公司。

sentences.english: Pilger said he knows that Assange has angered some people.
sentences.chinese: 皮尔格说他知道阿桑奇得罪了一些人。

sentences.english: Serbia's also experienced 38 degree heat on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 尔维亚首都贝尔格莱德也遭遇到了38度的高温。

definition: Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
rad (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword)
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Keller or Köhler (name)/Horst Köhler (1943-), German economist and CDU politician, head of the IMF 2000-2004, president of Germany 2004-2010
